text:
The starteam tasks as currently written are only useful for pulling files in 
and out of the repository without comparing them to the repository.  This 
means that checkouts take significantly longer than they might otherwise have 
to.  This means that the tasks are useful for doing full builds of a clean 
checkout of sources into an empty directory, but any optimizations that would 
not check out the files if they are current are not possible.
creator: stevec@ignitesports.com
stevec@ignitesports.com
text:
Created attachment 3708
major refactoring solves biggest problem with these tasks

The attached patch is a major refactoring that solves these and several lesser 
problems.  Due to some prodding by user Ilja Teterin 
<ilja.teterin@atbusiness.com> (many thanks, Ilja)
I was finally able to find my way into the proper place in the StarTeam API to 
be able to reliably get statuses comparing an arbitrary local tree to the 
repository tree.  This means that checkins, checkouts, and and listings are 
much more useful than they have been up to now.

Also, there is much improved logging.  The build number of the starteam sdk in 
use on the user's installation is now displayed when ant is run on any of 
these tasks with -debug.
creator: stevec@ignitesports.com
stevec@ignitesports.com

text:
NOTE TO COMMITTER.  Patches number 3708 and 3709 submitted 11/04/02 SHOULD not 
be applied to source code.  They have been replace by patches 3719 and 3729 
submitted 11/05/02.  These should be applied.

Sorry about this but BUGZILLA will not let me delete patches I have submitted.
These patches fix the reopened defect 14006.

May I ask why you put this as 'fixed' while it is not 'fixed' ?

Anyone (at least me) will have a hard time bumping into this bug if it is set 
as 'fixed' and the patch is still pending...
I might be missing something of course.
creator: sbailliez@apache.org
bodewig@apache.org
text: *** Bug 14006 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text: *** Bug 14210 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text:
OK, patch is in CVS, thanks.

Steve, do you have a short ounch line for this patch?  Something to put into
WHATSNEW.

COMMENTS FOR WHATSNEW
---------------------
The starteam stcheckout, stcheckin tasks now correctly compute status of files
against whatever local tree they are run against and, optionally, will not
process a file if it is current.  Previously you had to process everything
unless you ran against the default folder which wasn't the normal use-case for
ant-starteam.  The stlist task now similarly displays that status correctly
making it a more generally useful tool.  Support added for revision labels and
build labels.  Checkouts now have the option of using repository timestamps,
instead of current.
creator: stevec@ignitesports.com
stevec@ignitesports.com
text: *** Bug 9849 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

kinjal.vohra@mentorix.com reopened this bug without any explanation.  Perhaps it
is due to forced checkouts still ignoring status.  If this is the case, then
instead this bug should be resolved and marked as a duplicate of 35852 which has
resolution patches uploaded and ready to be committed.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 35852 ***
